      • getReferenceService

        public ReferenceService getReferenceService()
        Description copied from interface: InvocationContext
        Return the reference service to be used within this invocation context
        Specified by:
        getReferenceService in interface InvocationContext
        Returns:
        a configured instance of ReferenceService to be used to resolve and register references to data in the workflow

      • getEntities

        public <T> List<T> getEntities(Class<T> entityType)
        Description copied from interface: ReferenceContext
        Return a list of all entities in the resolution context which match the supplied entity type argument.
        Specified by:
        getEntities in interface ReferenceContext
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type of the returned entity list. In general the compiler is smart enough that you don't need to specify this, it can pick it up from the entityType parameter.
        Parameters:
        entityType - Class of entity to return. Use Object.class to return all entities within the reference context
        Returns:
        a list of entities from the reference context which can be cast to the specified type.
